Name: Basic Torpedo Launcher
Effect: +10dpt.

Name: Exhausting Gun
Effect: +20dpt but the occupant has their performance halved. // Fires 100 dmg at turn 4* after which the occupant will have their performance halved for the rest of the battle.

Name: Flesh Cannon
Effect: 60 dmg every 4turns* but the occupant loses -1HP each time.

Name: Blood Beam
Effect: Every time a crew member loses HP* +5dpt for the rest of the battle. // At turn 10* fire a blood beam that deals 40 damage for every 1HP that a crew member lost this battle.

Name: Excrelaser
Effect: Permanently excrement-flooded. Deals +10dpt for every adjacent module that’s excrement-flooded including this one. Every time it's hit* excrement-flood a random adjacent module.

Name: Excretor
Effect: If this module becomes excrement-flooded* undo the flooding and throw the excrement at the enemy dealing 50 dmg and causing poisoning.

Name: Corpse Shield
Effect: If a crew member dies* their corpse will be launched to block the next attack entirely.

Name: Cult Headquarters
Effect: The occupier's trait will be Cult Leader: Adjacent crew members have +5%P but will also suffer the same ailment loss of HP and death of the occupier.

Name: Portable Nursing Home
Effect: At the start of battle* generate a no-profession centenarian in an adjacent module.

Name: Stuck Rocket Launcher
Effect: It's stuck* so it doesn't fire unless the module is hit by the enemy. Once per battle deals 150 damage.

Name: Dream Extractor
Effect: Once per battle if the occupant falls asleep* cover the ship in a 150 HP shield of dreamy clouds.

Name: Triumphant Regenerator
Effect: If you finished a battle with no more than (20% of the monster health less) than you started it* heal 5% of your Ship Health max.

Name: Jelly Flexi-Membrane
Effect: Once per battle* if this module is hit by the enemy* block the attack entirely and deal damage equal to the attack deflected.

Name: War General AI
Effect: Unmanned. This module counts for having a War General in it.

Name: Adjacent Automatiser
Effect: Automatises a random adjacent empty module that needs to be manned.

Name: Mind Control Unit
Effect: The occupier will have the same trait as the crew member adjacent to the left.

Name: Motherly Jellycarer
Effect: If this module was hit* heal it's occupier +2HP and the ship 50HP at the end of the battle.

Name: Temporary Buffer
Effect: If this module is hit* your ship takes no damage. If this module is hit 4 times* counting previous battles* it explodes.

Name: Chamber of Sacrifice
Effect: At turn 10* the occupant will be sacrificed and you gain 300 ship health. // If hit* you take no ship damage* the occupant will be sacrificed and you gain 100 ship health.

Name: Mimic Room
Effect: At the start of battle it transforms into an identical copy of a random adjacent module* until the end of the battle.

Name: Coral Golem
Effect: Unmanned. Every time it’s hit the ship takes no damage. With every hit it will become more damaged* and after 5 hits this module explodes.
Special Req: Only works if adjacent to a Defensive module.

Name: Mini-Hospital
Effect: At turn 12* heal +1HP to a random adjacent crew member* or +1HP to each adjacent crew member if manned by a Doctor.

Name: Passive Regenerator
Effect: +10hpt. // +5hpt* +10hpt if manned by a War General.

Name: Robot Factory
Effect: At the end of battle* consumes 1 Fuel and you gain a random crew member with Robot trait. This crew member will expire at the end of its first battle. // Consumes 1 Fuel to generate a random crew member with Robot trait at the start of the battle. This crew member will expire at the end of the battle.

Name: Rulebreaker
Effect: The module below has its requirements obviated. If manned by an Engineer* both the modules below and above have their requirements obviated.

Name: Harpoon Launcher
Effect: Every 4 turns* fires a harpoon that deals 50 damage. Every subsequent harpoon deals 10 less damage than the previous one down to a minimum of 10 damage.

Name: Anglerfish Glare
Effect: At turn 4* blind the enemy. // At turn 10* blind the enemy.
Special Req: Must be placed on the leftmost column.

Name: Stingray Fin
Effect: Attack before the enemy in every battle. // Must be placed in the rightmost column available in your current ship* or the rightmost column available in the invisible grid? latter option is a better requirement for such a strong module* but only works if the layout grid is finite.
Special Req: Must be placed on the rightmost column.

Name: Charging Laser Beam
Effect: If undisturbed for 8 turns in a row* it shoots a 200 damage lase beam.

Name: Magicoral
Effect: If this module wasn't disturbed* heal the occupant and all adjacent crew members for 1 HP at the end of the battle. // 2 HP.

Name: Hygienic Chamber
Effect: Undo excrement-flooding* sick and poisoning immediately. // Chance to undo excrement-flooding* sick and poisoning at will.

Name: Electroconvulsive Therapy Chamber.
Effect: At the end of the battle* there's an 80% chance the occupier has their trait changed to a positive trait and lunatic ailment is removed* and a 20% chance they die.

Name: Organic Recycler
Effect: Every time an adjacent crew member dies* you gain 2 Fuel.

Name: Submarine Recycler
Effect: Every time an adjacent module is destroyed* you receive the same module but with no side effects and an extra different random defect. // When a module with 4 defects is destroyed* it's no longer recreated.

Name: Item Recycler 1
Effect: Every time an item is consumed or destroyed* you receive another random item that will expire at the end of its first battle.

Name: Biotransformer
Effect: For every 3 defeated monsters* you gain a random Organic A module* or Organic B if manned by a Biologist.

Name: Isolation Bunker
Effect: This module is indestructible and its occupier can't take damage from the enemy. However* the first occupant placed in this module can't ever be moved out* and they will be classed as adjacent to no other module or crew member. // After 10 battles* the occupant becomes Lunatic.

Name: Sticky Pod
Effect: This module doesn't require a purchased slot to be placed. Always comes with a side effect.

Name: Casino
Effect: Any percentage-based effect inside this module will have a higher chance of having a positive outcome instead of a negative one. // In adjacent modules.

Name: Weed Garden
Effect: This module is permanently Wild. The occupant's trait will be Stoned for as long as they're in this module: -20%P* +1HP/4turns and +2 max HP.

Name: Defensive Accumulator
Effect: For every defensive module connected in a defensive path to this one* increase your ship's max health by 20. // by 50.

Name: Pharmacy
Effect: The occupant will have Doctor as their profession while in this module. At the end of the battle* if an adjacent crew member lost HP* gain one Doctor Kit.

Name: Gym
Effect: If the occupant stays in this module for 2 battles in a row* they gain Bodybuilder as their secondary trait: +2 max HP and +5% base performance.

Name: Excreshield
Effect: Once per battle* if this module becomes excrement-flooded* empty it to create an excrement shield that will completely block the next enemy attack.

Name: Repair Station
Effect: If an adjacent module becomes damaged* it fixes it in 2 turns.

Name: Defensive Synergiser
Effect: Every time an adjacent defensive module's effect triggers* gain 20 ship health. // gain 40 ship health.

Name: Greedy Buffet
Effect: +1HP/4turns* but if they heal HP while at 6HP* the occupant becomes sick.

Name: Military School
Effect: If a cadet or lieutenant spends 1 battle in this module* +5% base performance* up to once per crew member.

Name: Impact Buffer
Effect: The first hit on this module per battle doesn't damage the ship or its crew member.

Name: Self-Destruct module
Effect: Activate this module for it to separate from the ship* and launch itself with its brave crew member into the enemy* causing a 400 dmg explosion that destroys both module and occupier. If operated by a War General* it deals 700 damage instead.

Name: Net Gun
Effect: Every 6 turns* throws a fishing net that deals 10 damage and lowers enemy dpt by 10. If a fishing net is thrown during the attack that defeats a monster* catch the monster instead and it yields an extra item.

Name: Explosive Redirector
Effect: Every time an adjacent module explodes* deal 150 damage to the enemy. // 300 damage.

Name: Coin Bullet Gun
Effect: Compresses your saved currency into hard golden bullets that deal more damage the more coins you have. 0dpt if you have 0 coins* and 10-100dpt for 1-50 coins. Every 4 turns* it consumes 1 coin to use. // Only consumes 1 coin every 8 turns if you have more than 25 coins.

Name: Fuel Rockets
Effect: They run on the same fuel as your ship* so it consumes 1 Fuel every 8 turns to throw a 100 damage rocket. // Can be activated/deactivated at any time. // At turn 2* throw a rocket that deals 100 damage and consumes 2 Fuel.

Name: Flamethrower
Effect: At turn 8* fires flames that deal 60 damage for every adjacent module that's set on fire* including this module* and also burns the enemy.

Name: Sticky Seaworm
Effect: Sticks to adjacent modules for the first 5 battles after it is first placed. +1HP/4turns and immunity to ailments.

Name: Combo Bomb
Effect: If you activate 3 effects in the same turn* launch a combo bomb that deals 150 dmg.

Name: Combo Regenerator
Effect: If you activate 3 effects in the same turn* heal for 100 Ship Health.

Name: Mental Reversal Capsule
Effect: Inverts the performance of the crew member in it. The formula is [NewP = 90-P] if P > 20* and [NewP = 100-P] if P < 20.

Name: Emergency Escape Engine
Effect: Use this module to eject the whole ship away from a battle* and this module is destroyed.

Name: Plumbing System
Effect: Extracts any water-flooding from anywhere in the ship. If this module gets hit* it becomes excrement-flooded.

Name: Flesh Connection Pods
Effect: They always appear as a pair in the shop. Whenever the occupant loses or gains HP in one of the modules* the occupant of the other module also loses/gains the same HP.

Name: Fuel Converter
Effect: At the end of the battle* consume 1 Fuel to heal the occupant 2HP. // 3HP.

Name: Fishing Bait Pod
Effect: The enemy has a 33% chance in each of its attacks to target this module.

Name: Mystery Room
Effect: At battle start and until the end of the battle* this module turns into another random module that isn’t a Mega-module (retaining the same requirements* defects and side effects).

Name: Magical Storage Room
Effect: At the end of battle* the item in this module will transform into a different item.

Name: Perfect Balance
Effect: Once per expedition* equalise the enemy's HP with the ship’s HP* calculating the mean of both values and applying it to the enemy and the ship. MAYBE IT SHOULD BE A SUPER ITEM.
Special Req: Only works when adjacent to two offensive and two defensive modules.

Name: Defensive Perfection
Effect: If manned by a War General* the enemy deals 75% the normal damage to our ship unless it first lands a hit onto this or any of its adjacent modules.
Special Req: Only works when adjacent to 4 defensive modules.

Name: Offensive Perfection
Effect: If manned by a War General* +60dpt unless it first lands a hit onto this or any of its adjacent modules.
Special Req: Only works when adjacent to 4 offensive modules.

Name: Beautiful Fish Tank
Effect: Unmanned. This module is permanently water-flooded. At the end of battle* you receive 1 Tasty Seafood. If hit* you get no Tasty Seafood and adjacent modules to the left and right are water-flooded.

Name: Decompression Core
Effect: This and adjacent modules can’t explode.

Name: Fuel Extractor
Effect: If this module gets flooded* it produces 1 Fuel at the end of the battle.

Name: Danger Thunder
Effect: Deals 150-0dpt depending on whether your ship has 50-500HP left.

Name: Brain Giga-Aumentator
Effect: +10%P. The occupant has an increased performance cap of 150%.

Name: Portable Mini-University
Effect: At the end of the battle* the occupant's profession will permanently change to a different random profession.

Name: Interdimensional Training
Effect: At battle start it closes its doors and transports the crew member into another dimension for 3 battles* during which it cannot be used. Then* they return transformed into an improved being with two positive traits* fully healed* 8 max HP and 70% base performance. There is a 20% chance the crew member returns as a centenarian that shits himself.

Name: Blood Absorber
Effect: If your crew has taken 8HP damage or more this battle* +150 ship health.

Name: The Golden Chamber
Effect: Costs 30 coins and comes more easily to players with lots of coins. Offers maximum comfort to its occupant* however it is extremely delicate as it is beautiful. If undisturbed for a battle* its occupant will give you 1 coin + 1 extra coin for every undisturbed battle in a row. If the module is disturbed* the counter resets back to 1 coin of reward.

Name: Sadomasochism Dungeon
Effect: If a crew member takes damage in this module* they gain Masochist as their secondary trait permanently.

Name: Electric Shockwave
Effect: At turn 4* electrocute the enemy for 100 damage* but there's a 40% chance it also damages your ship for 50 damage (15% chance if operated by a War General).

Name: Lunatic Brutaliser
Effect: The occupant will become Lunatic at the end of the battle. If a monster hits a module with a Lunatic* deal 100 damage. // similar to possessed chamber

Name: Irresistible Flesh Extractor
Effect: Every enemy attack yas a 33% chance of targeting this module* and the crew member in it takes double damage from enemy hits.

Name: Military Waking Alarm
Effect: Every 4 turns* removes Stunned* Sleepy and Asleep from all crew members* and +5%P to all adjacent Cadets and Lieutenants. // If operated by a War General* all adjacent crew members get a 10%P boost

Name: Trash Compactor
Effect: If an adjacent module is damaged* at the end of the battle you can recycle it into 250 ship health.

Name: Man Buffer
Effect: If this module gets hit* -2HP extra to the occupant but the ship takes no damage.

Name: Kinetic Absorber
Effect: Any time 1 crew member moves* it fires a kinetic blast to the enemy that deals 100 dmg. 100-300dmg.

Name: Discharge Sponge
Effect: If this module is hit* reduce enemy dmg by 20% for 4 turns* and stop berserk status. // -> 50% for 8 turns.

Name: Health Weaponiser
Effect: At turn 2* sacrifice 100 ship HP to launch a blast that deals 200 dmg. If operated by a War General* sacrifices 200 ship HP to deal 500 dmg. 150-400 dmg* 250-700dmg.

Name: Danger Alert
Effect: When the ship is below 1/3 HP* +5%P to this an adjacent crew members. If operated by a War General* +10%P instead when below 1/4 HP. // 2-40% +20-60%.

Name: Laser of Death
Effect: Grim Reaper themed. Every time a crew member dies* the damage of this module permanently increases +10* to a maximum of +100dpt. +2-20dpt* max 200dpt. // At turn 2* blast the enemy with a laser of death that deals 100 damage for every crew member that died in the previous battle.

Name: Restructurator
Effect: During the next prep phase* you can move to another place the slot that this module was in. If so* +5%P to the occupant of that slot in the next battle.
Special Req: Must be adjacent to all other 4 module types. Is this requirement still necessary?

Name: Tentacollector
Effect: It uses its long tentacles to pick up items every now and then. 50% chance of item at the end of battle.

Name: Pain Transformer
Effect: If a crew member loses HP in this module* it fires a piercing pain blast of 80 dmg into the enemy. 50-250%.

Name: Contagion Beam
Effect: At turn 10* shoot a diseased beam that deals 100 damage for each crew member with an ailment.

Name: Water-Based Doping module
Effect: When flooded* injects the water with enhancing drugs. +5%P in this or any water-flooded module. However if this module gets hit* the enemy will have +20%dpt in its next attack. // too similar to protein powder.

Name: Arctic Hull
Effect: Both parts always appear as a pair in the shop. Freeze the water around the ship to create an ice barrier that creates a 300 ship HP shield at the beginning of every battle. // The barrier* however* will disappear if any of the two modules is disturbed. 50-400 HP shield.
Special Req: One must be placed in the highest row of the Layout* and the other in the lowest row.

Name: Chamber of Infinite Wisdom
Effect: The crew member in this module will have a profession of your choice* and their performance cap will be 150%.

Name: Resourceful Blocker
Effect: Twice per battle* can throw an item at will to block an enemy attack. Block 25-100% of the damage.

Name: Seafood Absorber
Effect: Every time you win a battle* +20 to your ship HP* stacks up to 10 times. +5-20.

Name: Recruitbot 3000
Effect: You can insert 3 coins in it* and at the end of battle it will produce a random crew member.

Name: Item Multiplier
Effect: After 4 battles with an item in it* it will produce a copy of that item. 50-20 turns. // The occupier will be holding the same items as the occupier adjacent to the right.

Name: Steamthrower
Effect: When this or an adjacent module floods* instantly boils away the water to shoot scalding steam at the enemy that deals 100 dmg. Any crew member in the flooded module will take 1 HP dmg. 50-200 dmg.

Name: Autopilot Navigator
Effect: Unmanned. If this module was placed in the ship* after a successfull battle the ship will mark the juiciest Nodes nearby in the Node Map. 1-5 juicy nodes.
Special Req: Must be adjacent to the Captain.

Name: Professional Union
Effect: Unmanned. Only works when adjacent to 4 crew members of the same profession. When any of them die* this module will replace their Stacking Bonus count. Adjacent to 4-1 crew members of the same profession.
Special Req: Only works when adjacent to 4 crew members of the same profession.

Name: Corruption Node
Effect: Each non-organic module adjacent to this one has a 20% chance of changing into a random organic module at the end of a battle. 5-40% chance.

Name: Grand Professional Abduction
Effect: Every time you place a new type of professional in this module* it is consumed. If this module consumes 7 types of different professionals* it will grant the basic Stacking Bonus of every type of professional* but you can’t receive the bigger Stacking Bonuses. // Consumes one of each type of professional.

Name: Desperate Disintegrator
Effect: If you have 100 SHP or less* blast the enemy with a Nuclear Disintegrator that has a 50% chance of obliterating it and healing you for 500 SHP* and a 50% chance of destroying your own ship instead. There is only one per expedition.

Name: Greed Pact
Effect: -20dpt. After 10 victorious battles* +50dpt instead. -60-30dpt* then +50-80dpt.

Name: Mirror Room
Effect: The occupant will disappear at battle start. At the end of the battle* there’s a 30% chance they come out as Lunatic and a 70% chance both them and an exact copy exit the module.

Name: Ineptitude Distiller
Effect: The lower your total performance is* the more damage the ship does. Only works if the occupant has 10% or less performance.

Name: Gleaming Ruby
Effect: At battle start* all crew members become the same as the occupant of Gleaming Ruby.
Special Req: Only works when adjacent to 4 crew members.

Name: Sanatorium of Chaos
Effect: +10%P to all crew members* however* every battle* each of them will have a different random trait.

Name: Campus of Chaos
Effect: +10%P to all crew members* however* every battle* all of them will change to a random profession* but the same profession for all.

Name: Alien Takeover
Effect: +100/200/300/400/500 total performance depending on the depth you're in. Once per crew member* they will be abducted for 20 turns and then returned with the Reanimated Trait.

Name: Gates of the Chosen One
Effect: This module can’t be moved from its place in the layout. After 4 battles* the gates open and a crew member of a random profession and the The Chosen One trait appears.

Name: Portable Wormhole
Effect: At the start of every build phase* all of your modules and crew members change to completely random ones* but if you achieve a mean performance of 50%+* it automatically increases all crew members performance by 25%.

Name: Gleaming Sapphire
Effect: At battle start* all modules become the same as one of the modules adjacent to Mirroring Diamond.
Special Req: Only works when adjacent to 4 modules.

Name: Teleportation Laboratory
Effect: Every 2 turns* all crew members will teleport to other modules randomly. Every time a different crew member teleports into this module* deal 100 damage to the enemy.

Name: Purge House
Effect: All crew members will attack each other* dealing -1HP/2 turns. Every time a crew member loses HP* this module deals 100 damage to the enemy* and if a crew member dies* deals 300 damage instead.

Name: Escape Pod 1
Effect: If this module is about to explode or occupant about to die* eject the crew member to the bench while the module is ejected aiming to the enemy and deals 100 damage. // Also works for adjacent modules.

Name: Sleepy Sponge
Effect: If the enemy hits this module inflict Asleep status. The crew member in this module starts every battle Sleepy.

Name: Poisoning Spike Chamber
Effect: If this module is hit* the occupant takes the damage twice* and the enemy becomes Poisoned.

Name: Jacuzzi Module
Effect: If this module is water-flooded* there’s no drawbacks and +1HP/4turns. // +1HP/6turns

Name: Crocodile Tank
Effect: Every time the module is hit the crocodiles will bite the enemy for 100 dmg* but -1HP out of a total of 4HP. If the crocodiles are 0HP* this module becomes inactive. If a crew member is placed in this module they will die at battle start but fully heal the crocodiles.

Name: Insane Augmentator
Effect: +50%P* but -1HP/2turns and if they die this module explodes.

Name: Item Bombardier
Effect: If the crew member in this module holds an item you can launch it at the enemy to deal 100 dmg.

Name: Resourceful Blocker 2
Effect: If the occupant holds an item* there's a 33% chance with every enemy attack* that's thrown at the enemy to completely block the attack.

Name: Item Recycler 2
Effect: Every time an item is consumed or destroyed* 50% chance of receiving another random item.

Name: Unstable Channeler
Effect: +40dpt. If at any moment it is not adjacent to 4 crew members* this module explodes.

Name: Electrifier 1
Effect: Electrify this and all offensive modules chain-connected to this one. 20 damage every time the enemy hits an electrified module.

Name: Magifish Spawn
Effect: Releases Magifish to this and any other water-flooded modules in your ship. Magifish heal their crew member +1HP/4 turns.

Name: Invasive Urchins 1
Effect: If hit* deal 50 damage to the enemy and release sea urchins to all adjacent modules that will deal 50 damage to the enemy if also hit* and will also spread to more adjacent modules if hit.

Name: Uncontrolled Greenhouse
Effect: Adjacent modules have a 33% chance of becoming Wild at the end of a battle. Adjacent Wild modules have a 50% chance of protecting their occupant from enemy damage.

Name: Fire Station
Effect: If this or an adjacent module is set on fire* put it off and redirect it to the enemy to deal 100 damage. // If a module is set on fire* water-flood it instead.

Name: Heat Beam
Effect: +10dpt for each module* in the ship that's set on fire.

Name: Sushi Kitchen
Effect: If this module is hit* produce 1 Tasty Seafood.

Name: Brick Oven
Effect: If set on fire it will produce 1 Tasty Pizza at the end of the battle.

Name: Forge
Effect: If set on fire it will produce 1 metal weapon item at the end of the battle.

Name: Escape Pod 2
Effect: Activate this module’s effect for it to escape the battle with its occupier* and they'll reappear in a node further down.

Name: Isolator
Effect: Every 4 turns an adjacent module becomes Detached.

Name: Ephemeral Booster
Effect: +10%P to the crew member in it. At turn 4 this module always becomes detached.

Name: Orbital Laser
Effect: At turn 8 it deploys and detaches connecting with all other detached modules. Together they ready a laser that's beamed at the enemy dealing 80 damage per detached module.

Name: Petrifying Defender 1
Effect: Adjacent modules are inactive. For each adjacent module* gain a shield of 50 ship health.

Name: Sperm Bank
Effect: If undisturbed and if its occupant is female* at the end of the battle they will have Pregnant as their secondary trait.

Name: Mega Chimney
Effect: If set on fire* +1HP/4turns to this and adjacent crew members as well as preventing freezing.

Name: Rooted Core
Effect: If this module is Wild* +40 HP for every Wild module at the start of each battle.

Name: Unstable Gatling Gun
Effect: +80dpt* but this module is permanently unstable.*

Name: Overheat Laser
Effect: Every 4 turns deals 50 damage and a random adjacent module will be set on fire (70%) or become unstable (30%).

Name: Overheat Sparker
Effect: +60dpt. Unless this or an adjacent module is flooded* it'll be set on fire after 4 turns* and then become unstable in another 4 turns.

Name: High-precision Cutter
Effect: +40dpt. If the crew member in it has less than 70% performance* this module becomes unstable.

Name: Confinement Room
Effect: It's occupant or their items can't ever move from this module. Detaches at the start of battle.

Name: Gravity Engine
Effect: Avoid any module from detaching and any crew member from moving in battle.

Name: Anti-gravity Blaster
Effect: Every 4 turns* blasts the enemy for 80 damage but an adjacent module becomes detached.

Name: Contained Power Beam
Effect: Shoots a red beam that’s very thin* but the more damaged the module is* the more energy is released and the thicker the beam becomes. +5dpt. +50dpt if this module is damaged. +80dpt if this module is unstable.

Name: Oil Platform
Effect: If next to a Wild module during battle* produce 1 Fuel at the end of battle.

Name: Paper Factory
Effect: At the end of the battle* 50% chance to produce one of the following items: Recipe Book* Book of the Dead* Ancient Volume of Wisdom* Lost Page* Treasure Map* Love Letter* Suspicious Magazines* Military Propaganda* Notice of Termination* University Diploma or Cursed Book of Revival.

Name: Guinea Pig Laboratory 1
Effect: If a crew member dies in this module* all Scientists gain +10%P.

Name: Brain Replacer
Effect: A laboratory with shelves full of brains in jars* and robot hands that hang from the ceiling and transplant the brains. At the start of battle* the occupant is rerolled* and at the end of battle they’re returned to normal.

Name: Prehistoric Portal
Effect: This module is permanently Wild. Unmanned. At the start of each battle* Vicious Dinosaur appears in this module until the end of the battle.

Name: Crummy Deflector
Effect: This module is permanently damaged. If the enemy hits this or an adjacent module* the occupant and ship take no damage* and the enemy takes the damage of its own hit.

Name: Glacier Producer
Effect: Unmanned. If this or an adjacent module is water-flooded* it becomes frozen after 2 turns. Every time an enemy hits this or an adjacent module being frozen* they freeze and take 50 damage.

Name: Sewer
Effect: Unmanned. This module is permanently excrement-flooded. If hit* the enemy is poisoned* and it excrement-floods any adjacent module to the left and right.

Name: Atlantis Portal
Effect: Unmanned. While this module is surrounded by 4 water-flooded modules* it will be occupied by Atlantis Elder until the end of the battle.

Name: Human Catapult
Effect: If this or an adjacent module is hit by the enemy* the catapult fires the crew member in this module* who dies* dealing 400 dmg to the enemy.

Name: Magical Swap Box
Effect: The occupant* right before getting hit* will swap places with another random crew member.

Name: Invasive Urchins 2
Effect: At battle start* contaminate this module and those adjacent to the right and left with urchins* and -1HP to the three occupiers. If the enemy hits any of these 3 modules* deal 50 damage.

Name: Forceful Activator
Effect: All inactive adjacent modules will become active* even if unmanned and requirements not met* however they will be unstable.

Name: Cluster Suppressor
Effect: Reduce the enemy dpt by 3 for every defensive module connected in a defensive path to this one.

Name: Consolatory Regenerator
Effect: If you won a battle losing more than 500 health* heal 100 ship health.

Name: Organic Headquarters
Effect: This module is equivalent to 2 organic modules for stacking bonuses.

Name: Offensive Headquarters
Effect: This module is equivalent to 2 offensive modules for stacking bonuses.

Name: Defensive Headquarters
Effect: This module is equivalent to 2 defensive modules for stacking bonuses.

Name: Scientific Headquarters
Effect: This module is equivalent to 2 scientific modules for stacking bonuses.

Name: Headquarters
Effect: This module is equivalent to 2 normal modules for stacking bonuses.

Name: Complex Gun Cockpit
Effect: +5dpt for every 10%P the occupant has over 40%.

Name: Complex Ship Renovator
Effect: +5hpt for every 10%P the occupant has over 40%.

Name: Requireroom
Effect: +10%P to this and all adjacent modules.
Special Req: Must be adjacent to 4 modules with requirements being fulfilled.

Name: Boost Absorber
Effect: +5%P for every adjacent module with a side effect that affects this module.

Name: Anti-defective Garage
Effect: Modules adjacent to this one have their defect nullified.

Name: Disaster Pod
Effect: This module always comes with 4 defects and no side effects* but if hit by the enemy* it inflicts 50 damage and a random status.

Name: Elemental Beam
Effect: If this module gains an element* it's consumed and launched at the enemy dealing 100 damage.

Name: Enraging Blaster
Effect: Every 4 turns fires a 100 blast at the enemy* but the enemy gains +15dpt for the rest of the battle.

Name: Element Absorber
Effect: +10hpt as long as this module has an element.

Name: Super Laboratory
Effect: +5%P in any scientific module connected to this one in a scientific path.

Name: Rainbow Producer
Effect: +1 stacking bonus for each of the 5 types.
Special Req: Must be adjacent to one module of each other type.

Name: Hyper Laser
Effect: +10dpt for each offensive module in this row. // At turn 6* deal 50 damage for each offensive module in a row with this one.
Special Req: Must be in a row with 5 other offensive modules.

Name: Ship Expander
Effect: You have an extra slot in any space adjacent to this module. If the occupant is an Engineer* you have 2 extra slots instead.

Name: Reflective Gem Cave
Effect: This module is of the same type as the most abundant module type in your ship* and counts as two stacking bonuses for its type. If no type is more abundant than other* it defaults to Normal type.

Name: Floating Shield
Effect: If this module is detached* gain a 50HP shield this battle* and add to that shield +20HP for every other detached module.

Name: Submarine Unlocker
Effect: The module adjacent below has its requirements ignored.

Name: Accumulating Shield
Effect: Every 4 turns* create a 10HP shield. Each shield is 10HP thicker than the previous one.

Name: Extra-aggressor
Effect: At battle start* a random adjacent module is designated and will have its damage increased by 50% for the rest of the battle.

Name: Private Academy
Effect: This module will consume 4 coins at battle start* otherwise will be inactive. At the end of the battle* the occupant will gain a secondary trait guaranteed to be positive.

Name: Golden Safe
Effect: Unmanned. If it explodes* you gain a random amount of coins between 4 and 12 coins.

Name: Luxury Hotel
Effect: When a crew member is placed in this module* they are fully healed. However* they cannot be moved from this module unless you pay 2 coins.

Name: Chamber of Painful Immortality 1
Effect: -1HP/4turns to this and adjacent crew members. If the occupant reaches 0 HP* instead of dying they heal to full HP and deal to the enemy 40 damage for each drained adjacent crew member.

Name: Chamber of Painful Immortality 3
Effect: -30%P* -1HP/4turns. If the occupant reaches 0 HP* instead of dying they heal to full HP and deal 50 damage to the enemy.

Name: Selfish Death Avoider
Effect: If the occupant reaches 0 HP* they don't die* they heal 2 HP and a random adjacent crew member dies instead.

Name: Mind-supressing Pod
Effect: The occupant's traits won't have any effect.

Name: Infinity Garage
Effect: At battle start* the occupant will be equipped with a random item that will expire at the end of the battle.

Name: Vertical Catapult
Effect: +10dpt for each offensive module in this column. // At turn 6* deal 50 damage for each offensive module in a column with this one.

Name: Petrifying Defender 2
Effect: If an active adjacent module is hit* the hit is blocked and the ship takes no damage* but the module becomes inactive.

Name: Rotten Entrails
Effect: Every 2 turns* 20% chance the occupier becomes sick. If hit by the enemy* it becomes poisoned.

Name: Guinea Pig Laboratory 2
Effect: If a crew member dies in this module* all Scientists gain +1% base performance permanently.

Name: Ultrafast Server
Effect: Unmanned. All Developers gain +5%P* but if this module suffers from an element* -10%P to all Developers instead.

Name: Concentration Chamber
Effect: The occupant's performance can't be lowered.

Name: Ice Beam
Effect: At turn 6* shoots a beam of ice that does 200 damage* after which the occupant will remain frozen.

Name: Iglu
Effect: If set on fire* this module disappears and its occupant drowns. If hit by the enemy* they become frozen.

Name: Ice Shield
Effect: If the occupant is about to get hit* this module freezes to protect them from the hit* and the occupant becomes frozen too.

Name: Empowered Electrifier 2
Effect: If this or a module connected in an offensive path to this one is hit by the enemy* the enemy is shocked for 30 damage for each offensive module connected* but all the occupants of the electrified modules suffer -1HP.

Name: Pain-sharing Compartments
Effect: Whenever a crew member takes damage in one of the modules* so will the other one.

Name: Hunting Settlement
Effect: If this module is Wild* its crew member will throw wooden spears at the enemy* +30dpt.

Name: Idiot Cockpit
Effect: The lower the occupant’s performance* the higher this module’s dpt is. 70/50/20/10/0 at 0/10/20/30/40%P respectively.

Name: Contaminating Fuel Refinery
Effect: At the end of each battle* produce 1 Fuel* however the modules adjacent to the left and right will be heavily contaminated and cause their occupiers Poisoning. // 50% chance of +1 Fuel if enemies are in node paths* +2 if enemies are in nodes?

Name: Basic Fishcapsule
Effect: Module built by a Biologist from a creature that doesn’t have an exclusive module. Every enemy attack yas a 33% chance of targeting this module. 5-50% chance to attract each attack.

Name: Sticky Node
Effect: Once a module is placed adjacent to this one* it can’t be separated. Every time the enemy hits this module* they lose 10% of their current dpt.

Name: Prehistoric Shelter
Effect: The occupant won't lose HP from the first enemy hit each battle* but after that hit the module becomes damaged unless its Wild.

Name: Multitype Capsule
Effect: Every time you place this module in the layout* it's type changes in order to the next of the 5 basic types* starting by being Normal type* and it counts as two stacking bonus for its current type.

Name: Battle Synergiser
Effect: If this module it's a different type than normal* at battle start and until the end of battle it also transforms into a random module of that type.

Name: Delicate Toilet 2
Effect: Fixes excrement-flooding in this module instantly. However if hit by the enemy* all modules under this one become excrement-flooded. // Similar to Plumbing System but cooler.

Name: Hologram Producer
Effect: At battle start* if unmanned* produces an occupant of the same name* gender* profession and trait as a random adjacent crew member* with 40% base performance and 6 HP* that will expire at the end of the battle.

Name: Prime Submarine
Effect: At the end of its first battle* it permanently transforms into another random module in your ship or bench.

Name: Illusion Module
Effect: This module works unmanned. The contents of this module will be identical of those of the module adjacent to the right.

Name: Submarine Crypt
Effect: If a crew member dies in this module* their corpse remains in it. They will count for profession stacking bonus and nothing else.

Name: Palpitating Viscera
Effect: Every 4 turns* it palpitates aggressively and drains 1 HP from its occupant* healing the ship 50 HP.

Name: Defense Office
Effect: Gain +5hpt for each 50 ship health above 1000 that your ship has* including shields.

Name: Attack Office
Effect: Increase your ship DPT by 5%.

Name: Bone Capsule
Effect: If hit* there's a 33% chance it doesn't harm the occupier. // If hit by a physical attack* it won't harm the occupier.

Name: Investment Agency
Effect: If the occupant has 70% or more performance* gain 1 coin at the end of the battle.

Name: Hyperperformer
Effect: x1*3 performance to a random adjacent module at the start of battle.

Name: Echo Channeler
Effect: The module on the left has its first effect doubled* up to once per battle.

Name: Maximum Concentration Laser
Effect: If this or any adjacent modules have been disturbed* at turn 10 fire a beam that deals 300 damage.

Name: Morgue
Effect: Every time a crew member dies while this module is in the ship* increase the corpses in this module by 1. If this module explodes* at the end of the battle receive as many Drowned Islander items as corpses this module had.

Name: Sacred Crematorium
Effect: If the occupant dies* receive Mysterious Ashes at the end of the battle.

Name: Internship Program 1
Effect: Can't place a crew member in this module during prep phase. At battle start* a random intern will appear in this module until the end of the battle. They will always have a trait of -1 cost.

Name: Peaceful Garden 1
Effect: This module is Wild when first adquired. +1HP/4turns.

Name: Peaceful Garden 2
Effect: This module is permanently Wild. +1HP/4turns.

Name: Vegetable Greenhouse
Effect: If this module is Wild* +1HP/4turns.

Name: Compost Factory
Effect: If this module becomes excrement-flooded* after 2 turns it instead becomes Wild* and the occupant heals 1 HP.

Name: Blizzardmaker
Effect: At turn 4* produce a Blizzard that freezes the enemy and also all modules on this row to the left.

Name: Ice Cube Gun
Effect: This module becomes frozen at battle start. Throws ice cubes as bullets. +10dpt for each frozen module in your ship.

Name: Bad Restaurant 1
Effect: The food might be good or bad: every 4 turns* 50% chance of +2HP* 50% chance of -1HP.

Name: Bad Restaurant 2
Effect: The food might be good or bad: every 4 turns* 50% chance of +2HP* 50% chance of -1HP.

Name: Organ Transplant Centre
Effect: If a crew member dies that isn't the occupant* 50% chance they revive with 2 HP and another random crew member loses 1 HP.
Special Req: Can only be manned by a Doctor

Name: Item Transformer 1
Effect: At battle start* the item in this module permanently changes to another random item. // Too similar to the magic module Magical Storage Room.

Name: Item Transformer 2
Effect: At battle start* the item in this module changes to another random item until the end of battle.

Name: Haunted Mansion
Effect: This module is unmanned. This and all adjacent modules will be inhabited by creepy spirits* and if the enemy hits any of these modules they suffer 100 damage and they won't hit them again. Modules with spirits have -5%P.

Name: Possessed Chamber
Effect: The occupier is possessed and gains great strength* being immortal and hitting the enemy back for 100 damage if hit* but they become Lunatic at the end of the battle. // similar to lunatic brutaliser.

Name: Arcane Library
Effect: If the occupier is a Wizard* +5%P* if not* their profession permanently changes to Wizard but they also become Lunatic.

Name: Cannibal Kitchen
Effect: If the occupant dies* each adjacent crew member heals +1HP.

Name: Internship Program 2
Effect: Can't place a crew member in this module during prep phase. At battle start* a random intern will appear in this module until the end of the battle. They will always have a trait of -1 cost and Cadet profession.

Name: Megaton Core
Effect: Extremely heavy nucleus that can’t be manned. It increases your ship’s HP by 200* and this an adjacent modules can't be damaged or unstable. Once placed in a slot of the layout* it can’t ever be moved from there.

Name: Octocamouflage
Effect: Live octopus that becomes the colour and type of the most common adjacent module. If no type is more common than others* it remains Organic.

Name: Cleansing Sponge
Effect: Absorbs water* cleanses it from nasty particles and then releases it* water-flooding all modules left and right for 4 turns with shiny water that doesn't lower performance and removes ailments.

Name: Emergency Freezing
Effect: If a crew member reaches 1 HP* they and their module are frozen.

Name: Systemic Freezer
Effect: When a module floods* it instantly becomes frozen. If the enemy hits a frozen module* it becomes frozen* deal 50 damage* and undo the freezing of the module hit.

Name: Freezeitor 2000
Effect: Once per battle you can freeze or defrost this or an adjacent module.

Name: Insane Laboratory
Effect: At the end of battle* produce a random crew member that's permanently Lunatic.
Special Req: Can only be manned by a Lunatic

Name: Violence Receptacle
Effect: Whenever a crew member harms another* accumulate 1 violent energy in this module. When this module is hit by the enemy* release all the accumulated violence dealing damage equal to 50 x violent energy.
